name: JumpGun! (Trial version)
description:
Jan. 31th 2018 Updated!

JumpGun! is a puzzle platformer game which you can't jump. It was started from Fukushima GameJam 2013 and is developing continuous.
This trial version is available 15 stages of Arrival and 13 stages of Wind.

Controls
WASD key or Arrow key : Move
Space key : Shot
R key : Retry current stage.
Hold R key and U key in 2 seconds : Return to title.
